item.title: Imagination PowerVR Mesa Vulkan Driver Enables Unofficial Support For More GPUs
item.description: Merged today for the Mesa 25.3 graphics driver code is enabling support for more PowerVR Imagination GPUs within the "PVR" Vulkan driver albeit not officially supported nor in active development. Your mileage may vary but for some users with certain GPUs may work out well enough...

item.title: CLUDA Posted For Mesa: Gallium3D API Implemented Atop NVIDIA CUDA Driver API
item.description: Well, here is a weekend surprise... Red Hat engineer and Rusticl lead developer Karol Herbst has opened a Mesa merge request for "CLUDA" as a compute-only driver that implements the Gallium3D API atop the NVIDIA CUDA driver API. Wow...

item.title: Linux Patches Posted For Microsoft's ACPI Fan Extensions
item.description: Patches were posted this week for implementing Microsoft's extensions around the ACPI fan device for allowing the operating system to set fan speed trip points. In turn this should help some HP systems and likely other OEMs too in getting fan information working under Linux...
